category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_line_contains_IC_Absoc
preference.preference_description: Specifies if structure lines have additional data such as incremental change information or absolute occurrence information. Use this preference with the BOM_enable_mem_mgt_probability_percent preference for better memory management of structure expansions initiated by the bomwriter and plmxml_export utilities. It does not affect expansions initiated in Structure Manager. Valid Values: true - Lines in the structure have incremental change information, absolute occurrence information, or both. false - Lines in the structure do not have incremental change information or absolute occurrence information.
